A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't expect anything in this movie to written well... jokes\, plots\, characters\, relationships\, story line whatsoever... everything you have always loved about Star Wars is abandoned in this film. Beyond disppointing. If it hadn't been Star Wars we would have walked out. Sooooo many issues with this and as a true fan\, do not know where to begin. Consider yourself warned... (Well done Disney... Worse than Episode I) Sigh.
